Welcome to China POwer System Transition (CPOST) model documentation!

The China POwer System Transition (CPOST) model is an energy system optimization model for China’s electric power system transition. It has been co-developed and maintained by Prof. Zhou Wenji’s group at the School of Applied Economics, Renmin University of China, and Prof. Ren Hongtao at the School of Business, East China University of Science and Technology.
